title: GIS Data Quality and Geographic Positioning System
headline: Learn about data quality in geographic information system and global positioning system in this free online course.
description: This free online course will help you to gain an understanding of data quality in geographic information systems. You will be introduced to data assessment techniques, and the errors they may have. This will bring you up to speed with the aspects considered for data accuracy, the factors affecting spatial data quality, and the sources of error in spatial data. You will then learn about the map display and the global navigation satellite systems.

courseDescription:
This course will begin by introducing you to data quality, the different data measures available, data assessment techniques, and the errors they may have. You will learn about the various aspects considered for data accuracy, the factors affecting spatial data quality, and the sources of error in spatial data. You will also learn about map display and visualization in GIS. This will lead you to the different transformations that occur in the process, and how to edit data in terms of getting useful data. 

Next, you will become familiar with how you can transform information into conveyable images. You will gain an understanding of map graphic symbols, the symbols that you can use for different types of maps, and certain styles through which you select your map symbols. This will further lead you to the global positioning system. You will be introduced to the history of the global positioning system, the working principles, GPS satellite signals, and errors in GPS. You will also be brought up to speed with the global navigation satellite system and an introduction to QGIS. 

Lastly, you will be introduced to global navigation satellite systems and applications. You will gain knowledge about the different systems available, how these systems have evolved, and the control facilities that exist. This will then lead you to the brief history of QGIS, installation of QGIS software; how to download QGIS software from the internet, and install a different plug-in. You will also gain additional knowledge of the interface for QGIS and the various functionalities of QGIS. 

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
